title: "El daño es superlativo": Aníbal Fernández llamó a "levantar la voz" contra el Gobierno POLÍTICA El Intransigente

title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: Between 2021 and 2023, he served as Argentina's Minister of Security in the cabinet of President Alberto Fernández. He has held several cabinet positions under three presidents, serving in these offices for a total of over nine years.

title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: In 2021, he was appointed as Minister of Security. This happened as part of changes in the government after the 2021 legislative primary elections. He served in this role until December 2023.
